::: callout-note
#### Ts21 Neocortical Multiome Atlas

A single-nuclei multiomic (GEX + ATAC), gene regulatory atlas of Ts21 and matched control neocortical samples.
:::

### Highlights

-   Cell-specific gene expression (GEX)
-   Cell-specific chromatin accessibility (ATAC)
-   Cell-specific molecular mechanisms

### Tech

-   Quarto, Shiny (or Streamlit), Seurat/Scanpy, etc.
